actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to provide that legislation appropriating funds for payment of pay to Federal employees shall be enacted separately from other legislation.

summary.text: Sets forth the manner in which bills and resolutions should read when providing an appropriation for any government agency for the pay of its employees. Restricts amendments to such bills or resolutions to changes in monetary amounts. Makes this Act effective on October 1, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to provide that legislation appropriating funds for payment of pay to Federal employees shall be enacted separately from other legislation.
